ALBATROSS.mesh.beam_interval_mesh_3D(pts, ne, meshname)[source]

pts = list of nx (x,y,z) locations of a beam nodes (np) ne = list of number of elements for each segment between nodes (np-1) meshname = name of mesh

ALBATROSS.mesh.create_I_section(dims, num_el, meshname)[source]

dims = [height,width,flange1,flange2,web] num_el = [numel_flange1,numel_flange2,numel_web] meshname = name of mesh

ALBATROSS.mesh.create_circle(radius, num_el, meshname)[source]

radius = outer radius of circle num_el = number of elements along radial direction meshname = name of mesh

ALBATROSS.mesh.create_hollow_box(pts, thicknesses, num_el, meshname)[source]
pts = list of 4 corners of hollow box in (x,y) locations
provide in clockwise order starting from upper left:

[(pt1=upper left x,y), (pt2 = upper right x,y), (pt3=bottom right x,y), (pt4=bottom left x,y) ]

thicknesses = list of wall thicknesses for walls:

[(pt1 to pt2 thickness),(pt2 to pt3 thickness), (pt3 to pt4 thickness),(pt4 to pt1 thickness)]

num_el = list of number of elements through thickness for

each specified thickness

meshname = name of mesh

ALBATROSS.mesh.create_hollow_circle(radius, thickness, num_el, meshname)[source]

radius = outer radius of circle thicknesses = wall thickness num_el = number of elements through thickness meshname = name of mesh

ALBATROSS.mesh.create_rectangle(pts, num_el)[source]
